channel.title: Andrew admits it: RuneScape Server in Java
channel.description:
Andrew admitted that both client and server are coded in java.
Emg Blue asks: What Java platform does RuneScape use? Java EE, Java SE? Or are the servers on EE and clients on SE? Java SE for both client and server.
http://devblog.runescape.com/view_post.ws?post_id=29&page=1

item.title: Andrew admits it: RuneScape Server in Java
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:10, topic:301262”][quote author=Frell link=topic=397568.msg2951366#msg2951366 date=1252532246]
The first moparscape server ever was in c++…
[/quote]

No, it was in Java.

And no one that I know of thought the server was in C# (the language didn’t even exist that long ago did it?), the reason there was some conjecture that it could be written in C++ is that on their job listings some of the requirements are knowledge of programming in C++.

There is no way to prove what language a server you have no access to is written in at all however. You can run some tests and make educated guesses, but you will never know for sure.[/quote]
Taharok said something about wL making it in c++, then it was quickly ported to java for noobs etc.

and i meant rs2 if that means anything

Read full topic
item.source: Andrew admits it: RuneScape Server in Java

item.title: Andrew admits it: RuneScape Server in Java
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Frell:

The first moparscape server ever was in c++…

No, it was in Java.

And no one that I know of thought the server was in C# (the language didn’t even exist that long ago did it?), the reason there was some conjecture that it could be written in C++ is that on their job listings some of the requirements are knowledge of programming in C++.

There is no way to prove what language a server you have no access to is written in at all however. You can run some tests and make educated guesses, but you will never know for sure.

Read full topic
item.source: Andrew admits it: RuneScape Server in Java

item.title: Andrew admits it: RuneScape Server in Java
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled

@Unhandled wrote:

If you read some of Andrew’s Usenet posts circa 2001, he clearly shows that the server was (is) java.

item.title: Andrew admits it: RuneScape Server in Java
item.dc:creator: @abraham2119 abraham2119
item.description:
@abraham2119 wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:7, topic:301262”]I knew it was in java, this is just for all those who ride the shortbus and thought that runescape servers used C#.

I though wL made it in java as a way to test the bots in a private environment?[/quote]nobody thought rs’ server was in c#… people (including me until super_ proved to me that its written in java) believed it was written in c++

Read full topic

Andrew admitted that both client and server are coded in java.
